name: Béisbol
description:
You play as an 11-year-old from Billet Town who dreams of training and managing the greatest baseball team of all time. You recruit a team and travel from city to city playing the best teams for pennants. The type system is the same, but instead of picking moves and fighting, you pick a pitch or a swing and play baseball.
